title: 1931 - 2024 ANNE HAS ALWAYS F...
text:
1931 - 2024
Anne has always followed the path that God has laid for her; at the age of 92, she has been called to her Heavenly Home. God wanted her now; from pain she is free, and peace will be hers for eternity.
She is lovingly remembered by Boris Kozakavich, her husband of 66 years. Anne's children with their spouses and her grandchildren will always remember the abundant and unconditional love that she gave to each one of us: Nadine Hughes, Shelaine Kozakavich, Gary Kozakavich; with Brian Hughes, Valda Charles; and with Cole Zmurchok, Adrielle Zmurchok, Dean Kozakavich. She will be dearly missed by numerous relatives and friends; she always made time to lift up their hearts, showing compassion and grace.
Anne, Gracious One, we will miss you!
A Funeral Service will be held at 10:00 a.m. on Saturday, June 1, 2024, at Connelly-McKinley Funeral Home (10011-114 Street NW). Anne will be laid to rest at Westlawn Memorial Gardens (16310 Stony Plain Rd, Edmonton, AB).
Memorial Donations may be made in Anne's name to Pilgrims Hospice Society (9808 148 St NW, Edmonton, AB).
To send condolences please visit
www.connelly-mckinley.com
Published online May 25, 2024

Plant a tree: How does it work
When your purchase is complete, a post will be made on the tribute wall of the deceased signifying the planting of a memorial tree.
An official certificate recognizing your purchase will be included with your email receipt. You can then forward the email to the family or print it and give it to them personally.
After an order is placed, our forestry partners will plant the tree in the area of greatest need (nearest the funeral home), according to the planting schedule for the year.
Due to seasonal conditions, the tree planting takes place during the spring and summer.
Tree Planting Timeline
Orders placed in:
January - May
Planting will take place in Spring or Summer of the same year.
June - December
Planting will take place in Spring of the following year.
